content: The Humble and Contrite in Spirit
“Heaven is my throne,
what is the house that you would build for me,
All these things my hand has made,
But this is the one to whom I will look:
Rejoice with Jerusalem
“Before she was in labor
before her pain came upon her
Who has heard such a thing?
Shall a land be born in one day?
For as soon as Zion was in labor
Shall I bring to the point of birth and not cause to bring forth?”
“shall I, who cause to bring forth, shut the womb?”
Final Judgment and Glory of the Lord
“For behold, the  will come in fire,
to render his anger in fury,
For by fire will the  enter into judgment,
“Those who sanctify and purify themselves to go into the gardens, following one in the midst, eating pig's flesh and the abomination and mice, shall come to an end together, declares the .
“For I know their works and their thoughts, and the time is coming to gather all nations and tongues. And they shall come and shall see my glory,

and I will set a sign among them. And from them I will send survivors to the nations, to Tarshish, Pul, and Lud, who draw the bow, to Tubal and Javan, to the coastlands far away, that have not heard my fame or seen my glory. And they shall declare my glory among the nations.

And they shall bring all your brothers from all the nations as an offering to the , on horses and in chariots and in litters and on mules and on dromedaries, to my holy mountain Jerusalem, says the , just as the Israelites bring their grain offering in a clean vessel to the house of the .
And some of them also I will take for priests and for Levites, says the .

“And they shall go out and look on the dead bodies of the men who have rebelled against me. For their worm shall not die, their fire shall not be quenched, and they shall be an abhorrence to all flesh.”
